body:
I don't know if you're allowed to post links here but all the chapters of this series has been ripped and made available on k*****.p****. And don't worry, there's some spicy exhibitionism stuff in other chapters. The prologue doesn't do the entire series justice.

SPOILER: In one of the chapters she streams herself live in a crowded mall then strips in front of an elevator leaving all her clothes outside. She then goes inside and proceeds to stop by at every floor all the while flashing herself.

For those curious, this is just the prologue and chapter one. In total, this goes through the prologues, 15 chapters, and then an epilogue, all of which are extremely good if you are into exhibitionism.  I'd strongly recommend supporting NAZ on his Pixiv Fanbox and seeing the whole thing, it's easily one of my favorite doujins of all time
When will this be made into an animation series one day?
